name: An elegant whitewood staff (2h)
data: It has average weapon class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'optimize transfer'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'healing resonance'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'healing efficiency'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of medicine'.
